    • Constructor Detail

      • FileRingInputStream

        public FileRingInputStream(java.io.File dir,
                           java.lang.String prefix,
                           java.lang.String suffix,
                           int startingFile,
                           int ringSize)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory that holds the files.
        prefix - File prefix.
        suffix - File suffix.
        startingFile - The first file in the ring. This must be less than ringSize.
        ringSize - The ring size.

      • FileRingInputStream

        public FileRingInputStream(java.io.File dir,
                           java.lang.String prefix,
                           java.lang.String suffix)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory that holds the files.
        prefix - The prefix.
        suffix - The suffix.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On errors extracting the current file and ring size from the meta file, if one exists.

      • FileRingInputStream

        public FileRingInputStream(FileRingOutputStream fileRingOutputStream)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Use the output stream's parameters to construct an input stream. Reading is done from one past the current file number. Because the topology of the data is a ring, this functionally starts reading at the start of the oldest file.
        Parameters:
        fileRingOutputStream - The output stream we are writing to and want to read from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On errors.
